original_text: There was a little city with few men in it, and a great king came against it and besieged it, building great siegeworks against it.
korean_text: 곧 작고 인구가 많지 아니한 어떤 성읍에 큰 왕이 와서 그것을 에워싸고 큰 흉벽을 쌓고 치고자 할 때에

sentences.original_text: There was a little city with few men in it
and a great king came against it and besieged it
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 왕이 그 성을 치러 와서 포위했다
그 성을 향해 거대한 포위 공사를 했다
